product_name: Bug Doom Indoor Insect Control Spray, 16 oz (2-pack)
description:
Powerful pest control in a compact size

Bug Doom Indoor Insect Control Spray delivers effective pest control in a convenient 16 oz bottle for quick use around your home.

Harness botanically derived ingredients with Bug Doom Indoor. This ready-to-use spray provides safe, on-the-spot pest control without harsh chemicals. Formulated with chrysanthemum extract and canola oil, it targets ants, spiders, cockroaches, and more—even in your kitchen. The compact 16 oz size makes it easy to store and handle, so you can swiftly tackle pests whenever they appear.

Sunday creates effective pest control solutions that care for your home and the world around it.

sections.product_features:
Indoor spot treatment and home pest control
Kills dozens of indoor pests including ants, spiders, cockroaches, and more
Compact 16 oz size for easy handling and storage
Powered by chrysanthemum extract and canola oil
Formulated without harsh chemicals
No unpleasant odor
Ready to use—no mixing required
Ideal for use throughout your home, including kitchens
Easy to spray and apply safely
Includes two 16 oz. bottles of Bug Doom Home Insect Control Spray
sections.ingredients: Pyrethrin: Naturally derived from chrysanthemums, acts as an insect neurotoxin.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply when pests are active and shake well before use.
Spray directly onto insects or in areas where pests are frequent or can enter the home, such as doorways and windows. Keep children and pets away from treated areas until the spray has dried.
Reapply as needed for ongoing control.
Test spray in an inconspicuous area (especially on porous surfaces) and allow it to dry to check for possible staining before treating an entire area.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Yard Advisors:
What makes the 16 oz size of Bug Doom Indoor Insect Control Spray special?
The 16 oz size offers the same powerful pest control in a more compact bottle, making it easy to handle, store, and use for quick spot treatments throughout your home.
How do I use Bug Doom Indoor Insect Control Spray?
Spray Bug Doom directly on pests indoors or in areas where pests are frequent or can enter your home. It's perfect for spot treatments and quick responses to pest sightings.
What pests is Bug Doom effective against?
Bug Doom targets a wide range of indoor pests, including ants (excluding fire ants, harvester ants, Pharaoh ants, and carpenter ants), bed bugs, beetles, boxelder bugs, carpet beetles, centipedes, cockroaches, crickets, earwigs, flies, moths, silverfish, spiders (excluding black widow, brown recluse, and hobo spiders), and stink bugs.
Is there a risk of staining?
Because Bug Doom's main ingredient is canola oil, we recommend testing the spray in an inconspicuous area (especially on porous surfaces) before full application to check for possible staining.
Any state restrictions?
This product is approved for use in all states.
